column1: Smoque BBQ////The ribs seemed kind of small to me
column2: but they were cooked really well. Tender meat
column4: but giving to a little pull. Â The sausage was delicious
column5: nice bit of spice. All the meats had a great flavor on their own
column6: but I really liked the BBQ sauce
column8: I also loved dipping my fries in it.
